text: Ovidiu Marian Popescu (; born 27 February 1994) is a Romanian professional footballer who plays as a midfielder or a right back for FCSB. ==Club career== ===FCSB=== In June 2016, FCSB transferred Popescu for undisclosed fee, with the player penning a five-year deal with a €10 million buyout clause. He made his debut in the Liga I on 12 August against FC Botoșani, a game Steaua went on to win 2–0. On 8 September, also against Botoșani but in the Cupa Ligii, Popescu scored his first goal for the Roș-albaștrii. He finally scored his first league goal for the club with a free kick in a 2–0 victory over CFR Cluj on 12 March 2017. During early April, it was reported that Celtic and Southampton were interested in signing Popescu ==International career== In June 2015, Popescu was selected in Romania's squad for the 2017 UEFA European Under-21 Championship qualifier against Armenia. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |+ Club statistics |- !style="background: #DCDCDC; text-align: center" rowspan="2"|Club !style="background: #DCDCDC; text-align: center" rowspan="2"|Season !style="background: #DCDCDC; text-align: center" colspan="2"|League !style="background: #DCDCDC; text-align: center" colspan="2"|Cup !style="background: #DCDCDC; text-align: center" colspan="2"|League Cup !style="background: #DCDCDC; text-align: center" colspan="2"|Europe !style="background: #DCDCDC; text-align: center" colspan="2"|Other !style="background: #DCDCDC; text-align: center" colspan="3"|Total |- !
